summary: Implements the core single-page YouTube URL/videoId input + parsing + embed flow, and adds a custom-controls UI backed by a YouTube IFrame API hook with a dark theme. However, some control functionality is either explicitly left unwired (progress/seek bar) or cannot be confirmed due to truncation, and several unrequested/auth-related/backend pieces were added (including changes under paths called out as immutable in the BuildRequest constraints).

missing_requirements.requirement: Custom controls should include seeking via the progress bar (or otherwise wire the displayed progress control to player seeking).
missing_requirements.reason: The progress Sliderâ€™s onValueChange contains a comment indicating it is not wired to seekTo, so user-driven scrubbing via the progress bar is not implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Playback speed selector changes speed (e.g., 0.5x, 1x, 1.5x, 2x) and reflects current speed where feasible.
missing_requirements.reason: A speed selector is implied by imports/props (Select + onPlaybackRateChange), but the relevant JSX/options wiring is truncated, so the required behavior cannot be verified from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication context/provider and actor creation hooks (authentication/client-side identity management).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists user accounts/authentication (Internet Identity) as a non-goal, yet auth and actor hooks are included and main.tsx wraps the app in an InternetIdentityProvider.
BuildRequest requests a client-side-only feature and does not require backend changes/services; an empty backend actor was added anyway.
Not requested in requirements (REQ-1/2/3) and is an additional product/UI feature beyond the minimal YouTube player + theme scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Edits/additions under paths called out as immutable in constraints (hooks and main.tsx).
hallucinated_features.reason: Constraints state "Do not edit files under frontend immutablePaths (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/*, frontend/src/components/ui)" but new files/content appear under frontend/src/hooks/* and frontend/src/main.tsx is included in the diff set.
